type: TBIPS Tier 2 RFP - ESDC SAP Renewal (PSIB)
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement: TBIPS Tier 2 RFP - ESDC SAP Renewal**
===============

**Title**
----------

The Government of Canada, through the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), invites interested parties to submit a Proposal for the TBIPS Tier 2 Request for Proposal (RFP) for the SAP Renewal of the Employment and Social Development (ESDC) agency.

**Request Number**
-----------------

WS3705544553

**Posting Date**
---------------

October 27, 2022

**Closing Date**
---------------

December 5, 2022, 2:00 p.m. EST

**This Tender Exemption Notice is associated with**
-----------------------------------------------

Request for Proposal WS3705544553.

**Important Notice**
----------------

The amendment to the closing time for this tender exemption notice has been amended. All mandatory supporting documentation and bids must be submitted on December 5, 2022, by 2:00 p.m. EST. Any late submissions after 2:00 p.m. EST will be deemed non-responsive.

**Contract Description**
----------------------

The selected contractor will be responsible for providing consultation services for the SAP Renewal of the ESDC agency.

**Key Details**
---------------

*   Tender Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
*   Tender Status: Expired
*   Location: National Capital Region (NCR)
*   Contract End Date: None

**Contact Information**
----------------------

Contact: Holmes, Valerie (SPAC/PSPC)

Email: [valerie.holmes@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:valerie.holmes@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

**Online Documentation**
----------------------

Access the full tender documents by following the link below:
[value may need to be inserted]

[https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14484162?extsite=MTQ0ODQxNjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14484162?extsite=MTQ0ODQxNjJfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mj)
